componentDescription: An unstyled option group to be used within a Select.

propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true all the options in the group will be disabled.
propDescriptions.label: The human-readable description of the group.
propDescriptions.slotProps: The props used for each slot inside the Input.
propDescriptions.slots: The components used for each slot inside the OptionGroup. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component. See Slots API below for more details.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the root.
slotDescriptions.label: The component that renders the label.
slotDescriptions.list: The component that renders the list.
